entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

Humidity: 82 %

Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
